original: Majjhima Nikāya 32
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Mahāgosiṅgasutta
analyzed: mahāgosiṅgasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā gosiṅgasālavanadāye viharati sambahulehi abhiññātehi abhiññātehi therehi sāvakehi saddhiṁ—
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā gosiṅgasāla vana dāye viharati sambahulehi abhiññātehi abhiññātehi therehi sāvakehi saddhi

original: āyasmatā ca sāriputtena āyasmatā ca mahāmoggallānena āyasmatā ca mahākassapena āyasmatā
analyzed: āyasmatā ca sāriputtena āyasmatā ca mahāmoggallānena āyasmatā ca mahākassapena āyasmatā

original: ca anuruddhena āyasmatā ca revatena āyasmatā ca ānandena, aññehi ca abhiññātehi abhiññātehi
analyzed: ca anuruddhena āyasmatā ca revatena āyasmatā ca ānandena aññehi ca abhiññātehi abhiññātehi

original: therehi sāvakehi saddhiṁ.
analyzed: therehi sāvakehi saddhi

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahākassapo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākassapaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ yena āyasmā mahākassapo tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam mahākassapam etat avoca

original: “āyāmāvuso, kassapa, yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamissāma dhammassavanāyā”ti.
analyzed: āyāma āvuso kassapa yena ayasmā sāriputto tena upasaṅkamissāma dhammassavanāya ati

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa paccassosi.
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho āyasmā mahākassapaḥ āyasmataḥ mahāmoggallānassa paccassosi

original: Atha kho āyasmā ca mahāmoggallāno āyasmā ca mahākassapo āyasmā ca anuruddho yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṁsu dhammassavanāya.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā ca mahāmoggallānaḥ āyasmā ca mahākassapaḥ āyasmā ca anuruddho yena āyasmā sāriputto tena upasaṅkamisu dhamma ssavanāya

original: Addasā kho āyasmā ānando āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṁ āyasmantañca mahākassapaṁ āyasmantañca anuruddhaṁ yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamante dhammassavanāya.
analyzed: addasā kho āyasmantam ānandaḥ āyasmantam ca mahāmoggallānam āyasmantam ca mahākassapam āyasmantam ca anuruddham yena āyasmā sāriputto tena upasaṅkamante dhammassavanāya

original: Disvāna yenāyasmā revato tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ revataṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: disvāna yena āyasmā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam revatam etat avoca

original: “upasaṅkamantā kho amū, āvuso revata, sappurisā yenāyasmā sāriputto tena dhammassavanāya.
analyzed: upasaṅkamantā kho amū āvuso revata sappurisāḥ yena ayasmā sāriputto tena dhamma ssavanāya

original: Āyāmāvuso revata, yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamissāma dhammassavanāyā”ti.
analyzed: āyāma āvuso revata yena ayasmā sāriputto tena upasaṅkamissāma dhammassavanāya ati

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho āyasmā revato āyasmato ānandassa paccassosi.
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho āyasmā revataḥ āyasmato ānandassa paccassosi

original: Atha kho āyasmā ca revato āyasmā ca ānando yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkamiṁsu dhammassavanāya.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā ca revataḥ āyasmā ca ānandaḥ yena āyasmā sāriputto tena upasaṅkamisu dhamma ssavanāya

original: Addasā kho āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantañca revataṁ āyasmantañca ānandaṁ dūratova āgacchante.
analyzed: addasā kho āyasmā sāriputtaḥ āyasmantam ca revatam āyasmantam ca ānandam dūratas u vaḥ āgacchante

original: Disvāna āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: disvānaḥ āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “etu kho āyasmā ānando.
analyzed: etu kho āyasmai ānandaḥ

original: Svāgataṁ āyasmato ānandassa bhagavato upaṭṭhākassa bhagavato santikāvacarassa.
analyzed: svāgatam āyasmataḥ ānandassa bhagavataḥ upaṭṭhākassa bhagavataḥ santikāvacarassa

original: Ramaṇīyaṁ, āvuso ānanda, gosiṅgasālavanaṁ, dosinā ratti, sabbaphāliphullā sālā, dibbā, maññe, gandhā sampavanti;
analyzed: ramaṇīye āvuso ānanda gosiṅga sāla vana dosinā ratti sabba phāli phullā sālā dibbāḥ maññe gandhāḥ sampavanti

original: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso ānanda, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti?
analyzed: katharūpena āvuso ānanda bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: “Idhāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo. Ye te dhammā
analyzed: idha āvuso sāriputta bhikkhu bahu ssutaḥ hoti suta dharaḥ suta sannicayaḥ ye te dhammā

original: ādikalyāṇā majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthā sabyañjanā; kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ
analyzed: ādi kalyāṇā majjhe kalyāṇā pariyosāna kalyāṇā sa atthā sa byañjanā kevala paripuṇṇam parisuddha

original: brahmacariyaṁ abhivadanti, tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti, dhātā, vacasā paricitā,
analyzed: brahmacariyam abhivadanti tathārūpāssa dhammāḥ bahu sutāḥ honti dhātā vacasā paricitā

original: manasānupekkhitā, diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
analyzed: manasā an upekkhitā diṭṭhiyā su paṭividdhā

original: So catassannaṁ parisānaṁ dhammaṁ deseti parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi anuppabandhehi anusayasamugghātāya.
analyzed: so catassannam parisānam dhammam deseti parimaṇḍalehi pada byañjanehi anuppabandhehi anusaya samugghātāya

original: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti.
analyzed: evarūpena kho āvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ revataṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmā sāriputtaḥ āyasmantam revatam etat avoca

original: “byākataṁ kho, āvuso revata, āyasmatā ānandena yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
analyzed: byākatam khalu āvuso revataḥ āyasmatā ānandena yathāsakam

original: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ revataṁ pucchāma:
analyzed: tattha dāni mayam āyasmantam revatam pucchāma

original: ‘ramaṇīyaṁ, āvuso revata, gosiṅgasālavanaṁ, dosinā ratti, sabbaphāliphullā sālā, dibbā, maññe, gandhā sampavanti;
analyzed: ramaṇīye āvuso revata gosiṅga sālavana dosinā ratti sabba phāli phullā sālā dibbāḥ maññe gandhāḥ sampavanti

original: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso revata, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti?
analyzed: katharūpena āvuso revata bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: “Idhāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhu paṭisallānārāmo hoti paṭisallānarato, ajjhattaṁ cetosamathamanuyutto anirākatajjhāno, vipassanāya samannāgato, brūhetā suññāgārānaṁ.
analyzed: idha āvuso sāriputta bhikkhu paṭisallāna ārāmaḥ hoti paṭisallāna rataḥ ajjhattam cetaḥ samatham anuyuttaḥ a nirākata jjhānaḥ vipassanāya samannāgataḥ

original: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti.
analyzed: evarūpena kho āvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmā sāriputtaḥ āyasmantam anuruddham etat avoca

original: “byākataṁ kho, āvuso anuruddha, āyasmatā revatena yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
analyzed: byākatam khalu āvuso anuruddhaḥ āyasmatā revatena yathāsakam paṭibhāna

original: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ pucchāma:
analyzed: tattha dāni mayam āyasmantam anuruddham pucchāma

original: ‘ramaṇīyaṁ, āvuso anuruddha, gosiṅgasālavanaṁ, dosinā ratti, sabbaphāliphullā sālā, dibbā, maññe, gandhā sampavanti;
analyzed: ramaṇīye āvuso anuruddha gosiṅga sāla vana dosinā ratti sabba phāli phullā sālā dibbāḥ maññe gandhāḥ sampavanti

original: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso anuruddha, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti?
analyzed: katharūpena āvuso anuruddha bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: “Idhāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṁ lokānaṁ voloketi.
analyzed: idha āvuso sāriputta bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena sahassam lokānam voloketi

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso sāriputta, cakkhumā puriso uparipāsādavaragato sahassaṁ nemimaṇḍalānaṁ volokeyya;
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso sāriputta cakkhumā purisaḥ upari pāsāda vara gataḥ sahassam nemi maṇḍalānam volokeyya

original: evameva kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṁ lokānaṁ voloketi.
analyzed: evam eva kho āvuso sāriputta bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena sahassam lokānam voloketi

original: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti.
analyzed: evarūpena kho āvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ mahākassapaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmā sāriputtaḥ āyasmantam mahākassapam etat avoca

original: “byākataṁ kho, āvuso kassapa, āyasmatā anuruddhena yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
analyzed: byākatam kho āvuso kassapa āyasmatā anuruddhena yathāsakam paṭibhāna

original: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ mahākassapaṁ pucchāma:
analyzed: tattha dāni mayam āyasmantam mahākassapam pucchāma

original: ‘ramaṇīyaṁ, āvuso kassapa, gosiṅgasālavanaṁ, dosinā ratti, sabbaphāliphullā sālā, dibbā, maññe, gandhā sampavanti;
analyzed: ramaṇīye āvuso kassapa gosiṅga sālavana dosinā ratti sabba phāli phullā sālā dibbāḥ maññe gandhāḥ sampavanti

original: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso kassapa, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti?
analyzed: katharūpena āvuso kassapa bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: “Idhāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhu attanā ca āraññiko hoti āraññikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
analyzed: idha āvuso sāriputta bhikkhu attanā ca āraññikaḥ hoti āraññika ttassa ca vaṇṇa vādī

original: attanā ca piṇḍapātiko hoti piṇḍapātikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca paṁsukūliko
analyzed: attanā ca piṇḍapātikaḥ hoti piṇḍapātika ttassa ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca pasukūliko

original: hoti paṁsukūlikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca tecīvariko hoti tecīvarikattassa ca
analyzed: hoti pasukūlikattassa ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca tecīvarikaḥ hoti tecīvarikattassa ca

original: vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca appiccho hoti appicchatāya ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca santuṭṭho
analyzed: vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca appicchaḥ hoti appiccha tāya ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca santuṭṭho

original: hoti santuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca pavivitto hoti pavivekassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
analyzed: hoti santuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca pavivittaḥ hoti pavivekassa ca vaṇṇa vādī

original: attanā ca asaṁsaṭṭho hoti asaṁsaggassa ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca āraddhavīriyo hoti
analyzed: attanā ca a sasaṭṭhaḥ hoti a sasaggassa ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca āraddha vīriyaḥ hoti

original: vīriyārambhassa ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca sīlasampanno hoti sīlasampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī,
analyzed: vīriya ārambhassa ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca sīla sampannaḥ hoti sīla sampadāya ca vaṇṇa vādī

original: attanā ca samādhisampanno hoti samādhisampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca paññāsampanno
analyzed: attanā ca samādhi sampannaḥ hoti samādhi sampadāya ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca paññā sampannaḥ

original: hoti paññāsampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca vimuttisampanno hoti vimuttisampadāya
analyzed: hoti paññā sampadāya ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca vimutti sampannaḥ hoti vimutti sampadāya

original: ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno hoti vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī.
analyzed: ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca vimutti ñāṇa dassana sampannaḥ hoti vimutti ñāṇa dassana sampadāya ca vaṇṇa vādī

original: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti.
analyzed: evarūpena kho āvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmā sāriputtaḥ āyasmantam mahāmoggallānam etat avoca

original: “byākataṁ kho, āvuso moggallāna, āyasmatā mahākassapena yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
analyzed: byākatam khalu āvuso moggallānaḥ āyasmatā mahākassapena yathāsakam paṭibhāna

original: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ pucchāma:
analyzed: tattha dāni mayam āyasmantam mahāmoggallānam pucchāma

original: ‘ramaṇīyaṁ, āvuso moggallāna, gosiṅgasālavanaṁ, dosinā ratti, sabbaphāliphullā sālā, dibbā, maññe, gandhā sampavanti;
analyzed: ramaṇīye āvuso moggallāna gosiṅgasālavana dosinā ratti sabba phāli phullā sālā dibbāḥ maññe gandhāḥ sampavanti

original: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso moggallāna, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti?
analyzed: katharūpena āvuso moggallāna bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: “Idhāvuso sāriputta, dve bhikkhū abhidhammakathaṁ kathenti, te aññamaññaṁ pañhaṁ
analyzed: idha āvuso sāriputta dve bhikkhū abhidhamma katham kathenti te aññamaññam pañha

original: pucchanti, aññamaññassa pañhaṁ puṭṭhā vissajjenti, no ca saṁsādenti, dhammī ca nesaṁ
analyzed: pucchanti aññamaññassa pañham puṭṭhāḥ vissajjenti no ca sasādenti dhammī ca na isa

original: kathā pavattinī hoti.
analyzed: kathā pavattinī hoti

original: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti.
analyzed: evarūpena kho āvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ āyasmantam sāriputtam etat avoca

original: “byākataṁ kho, āvuso sāriputta, amhehi sabbeheva yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
analyzed: byākatam kho āvuso sāriputta amhehi sabbehi iva yathāsakam paṭibhāna

original: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ pucchāma:
analyzed: tattha dāni mayam āyasmantam sāriputtam pucchāma

original: ‘ramaṇīyaṁ, āvuso sāriputta, gosiṅgasālavanaṁ, dosinā ratti, sabbaphāliphullā sālā, dibbā, maññe, gandhā sampavanti;
analyzed: ramaṇīye āvuso sāriputta gosiṅga sāla vana dosinā ratti sabba phāli phullā sālā dibbāḥ maññe gandhāḥ sampavanti

original: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti?
analyzed: katharūpena āvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā gosiṅga sāla vanam sobheyya ati

original: “Idhāvuso moggallāna, bhikkhu cittaṁ vasaṁ vatteti, no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati.
analyzed: idha āvuso moggallāna bhikkhu cittam vasam vatteti no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati

original: So yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tāya vihārasamāpattiyā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharati;
analyzed: saḥ yāya vihāra samāpattiyā ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayam viharitu tāya vihāra samāpattiyā pubbaṇhasamayam viharati

original: yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati majjhanhikasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tāya vihārasamāpattiyā majjhanhikasamayaṁ viharati;
analyzed: yāya vihāra samāpattiyā ākaṅkhati majjhanhika samayam viharitu tāya vihāra samāpattiyā majjhanhika samayam viharati

original: yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati sāyanhasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tāya vihārasamāpattiyā sāyanhasamayaṁ viharati.
analyzed: yāya vihāra samāpattiyai ākaṅkhati sāyanhasamayam viharitu tāya vihāra samāpattiyā sāyanhasamayam viharati

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso moggallāna, rañño vā rājamahāmattassa vā nānārattānaṁ dussānaṁ dussakaraṇḍako pūro assa.
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso moggallāna raññaḥ vā rāja mahāmattassa vā nānā rattānam dussānam dussa karaṇḍakaḥ pūraḥ assa

original: So yaññadeva dussayugaṁ ākaṅkheyya pubbaṇhasamayaṁ pārupituṁ, taṁ tadeva dussayugaṁ pubbaṇhasamayaṁ pārupeyya;
analyzed: saḥ yaññat eva dussa yugam ākaṅkheyya pubbaṇhasamayam pārupitu tam tat eva dussa yugam pubbaṇhasamayam pārupeyya

original: yaññadeva dussayugaṁ ākaṅkheyya majjhanhikasamayaṁ pārupituṁ, taṁ tadeva dussayugaṁ majjhanhikasamayaṁ pārupeyya;
analyzed: yaññat eva dussa yugam ākaṅkheyya majjhanhika samayam pārupitu tam tat eva dussa yugam majjhanhika samayam pārupeyya

original: yaññadeva dussayugaṁ ākaṅkheyya sāyanhasamayaṁ pārupituṁ, taṁ tadeva dussayugaṁ sāyanhasamayaṁ pārupeyya.
analyzed: yaññat eva dussayugam ākaṅkheyya sāyanhasamayam tam tat eva dussayugam sāyanhasamayam pārupeyya

original: Evameva kho, āvuso moggallāna, bhikkhu cittaṁ vasaṁ vatteti, no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati.
analyzed: evam eva kho āvuso moggallāna bhikkhu cittam vasam vatteti no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati

original: So yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tāya vihārasamāpattiyā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharati;
analyzed: saḥ yāya vihāra samāpattiyā ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayam viharitu tāya vihāra samāpattiyā pubbaṇhasamayam viharati

original: yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati majjhanhikasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tāya vihārasamāpattiyā majjhanhikasamayaṁ viharati;
analyzed: yāya vihāra samāpattiyā ākaṅkhati majjhanhika samayam viharitu tāya vihāra samāpattiyā majjhanhika samayam viharati

original: yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati sāyanhasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tāya vihārasamāpattiyā sāyanhasamayaṁ viharati.
analyzed: yāya vihāra samāpattiyai ākaṅkhati sāyanhasamayam viharitu tāya vihāra samāpattiyā sāyanhasamayam viharati

original: Evarūpena kho, āvuso moggallāna, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti.
analyzed: evarūpena kho āvuso moggallāna bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto te āyasmante etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā sāriputto te āyasmante etat avoca

original: “byākataṁ kho, āvuso, amhehi sabbeheva yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
analyzed: byākatam kho āvuso amhehi sabbehi iva yathāsakam paṭibhāna

original: Āyāmāvuso, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamissāma; upasaṅkamitvā etamatthaṁ bhagavato ārocessāma.
analyzed: āyāma āvuso yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamissāma upasaṅkamitvā etam attham bhagavataḥ ārocessāma

original: Yathā no bhagavā byākarissati tathā naṁ dhāressāmā”ti.
analyzed: yathā naḥ bhagavā byākarissati tathā nam dhāressāma ati

original: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te āyasmanto āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: evam āvuso ti kho te āyasmantaḥ āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosu

original: Atha kho te āyasmanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu te āyasmantaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkamisu upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdisu ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā sāriputtaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “idha, bhante, āyasmā ca revato āyasmā ca ānando yenāhaṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁsu dhammassavanāya.
analyzed: idha bhante āyasmā ca revataḥ āyasmā ca ānandaḥ yena aham tena upasaṅkamisu dhammassavanāya

original: Addasaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, āyasmantañca revataṁ āyasmantañca ānandaṁ dūratova āgacchante.
analyzed: addasam kho aha bhante āyasmantam ca revatam āyasmantam ca ānandam dūratas u vaḥ āgacchante

original: Disvāna āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: disvānaḥ āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: ‘etu kho āyasmā ānando.
analyzed: etu kho āyasmai ānandaḥ

original: Svāgataṁ āyasmato ānandassa bhagavato upaṭṭhākassa bhagavato santikāvacarassa.
analyzed: svāgatam āyasmataḥ ānandassa bhagavataḥ upaṭṭhākassa bhagavataḥ santikāvacarassa

original: Ramaṇīyaṁ, āvuso ānanda, gosiṅgasālavanaṁ, dosinā ratti, sabbaphāliphullā sālā, dibbā, maññe, gandhā sampavanti;
analyzed: ramaṇīye āvuso ānanda gosiṅga sāla vana dosinā ratti sabba phāli phullā sālā dibbāḥ maññe gandhāḥ sampavanti

original: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso ānanda, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’ti?
analyzed: katharūpena āvuso ānanda bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, āyasmā ānando maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte bhante āyasmai ānandaḥ mama etat avoca

original: ‘idhāvuso, sāriputta, bhikkhu bahussuto hoti sutadharo …pe…
analyzed: idha āvuso sāriputta bhikkhu bahu ssutaḥ hoti suta dharaḥ pe

original: anusayasamugghātāya.
analyzed: anusaya samugghātāya

original: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti.
analyzed: evarūpena kho āvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: “Sādhu sādhu, sāriputta.
analyzed: sādhu sādhu sāriputta

original: Yathā taṁ ānandova sammā byākaramāno byākareyya.
analyzed: yathā tam ānandaḥ uva sammā byākaramānaḥ byākareyya

original: Ānando hi, sāriputta, bahussuto sutadharo sutasannicayo. Ye te dhammā ādikalyāṇā
analyzed: ānandaḥ hi sāriputta bahu sutaḥ suta dharaḥ suta sannicayaḥ ye te dhammāḥ ādi kalyāṇā

original: majjhekalyāṇā pariyosānakalyāṇā sātthā sabyañjanā; kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ
analyzed: majjhe kalyāṇā pariyosāna kalyāṇā sa atthā sa byañjanā kevala paripuṇṇam parisuddham

original: abhivadanti, tathārūpāssa dhammā bahussutā honti, dhātā, vacasā paricitā, manasānupekkhitā,
analyzed: abhivadanti tathārūpāssa dhammāḥ bahu ssutāḥ honti dhātā vacasā paricitā manasā anupekkhitā

original: diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā.
analyzed: diṭṭhiyā su paṭividdhā

original: So catassannaṁ parisānaṁ dhammaṁ deseti parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi anuppabandhehi anusayasamugghātāyā”ti.
analyzed: so catassannam parisānam dhammam deseti parimaṇḍalehi pada byañjanehi anuppabandhehi anusaya samugghātāya ati

original: “Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, āyasmantaṁ revataṁ etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte aha bhante āyasmantam revatam etat avoca

original: ‘byākataṁ kho, āvuso revata, āyasmatā ānandena yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
analyzed: byākatam khalu āvuso revataḥ āyasmatā ānandena yathāsakam

original: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ revataṁ pucchāma—
analyzed: tattha dāni mayam āyasmantam revatam pucchāma

original: ramaṇīyaṁ, āvuso revata, gosiṅgasālavanaṁ, dosinā ratti, sabbaphāliphullā sālā, dibbā maññe gandhā sampavanti.
analyzed: ramaṇīye āvuso revata gosiṅga sālavana dosinā ratti sabba phāli phullā sālā dibbāḥ maññe gandhāḥ sampavanti

original: Kathaṁrūpena, āvuso revata, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’ti?
analyzed: katharūpena āvuso revata bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, āyasmā revato maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte bhante āyasmā revataḥ mama etat avoca

original: ‘idhāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhu paṭisallānārāmo hoti paṭisallānarato, ajjhattaṁ cetosamathamanuyutto, anirākatajjhāno, vipassanāya samannāgato, brūhetā suññāgārānaṁ.
analyzed: idha āvuso sāriputta bhikkhu paṭisallāna ārāmaḥ hoti paṭisallāna rataḥ ajjhattam cetaḥ samatham anuyuttaḥ a nirākata jjhānaḥ vipassanāya samannāgataḥ

original: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti.
analyzed: evarūpena kho āvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: “Sādhu sādhu, sāriputta.
analyzed: sādhu sādhu sāriputta

original: Yathā taṁ revatova sammā byākaramāno byākareyya.
analyzed: yathā tam revatā uva sammā byākaramānaḥ byākareyya

original: Revato hi, sāriputta, paṭisallānārāmo paṭisallānarato, ajjhattaṁ cetosamathamanuyutto anirākatajjhāno, vipassanāya samannāgato brūhetā suññāgārānan”ti.
analyzed: revataḥ hi sāriputta paṭisallāna ārāmaḥ paṭisallāna rataḥ ajjhattam cetaḥ samatham anuyuttaḥ a nirākata jjhānaḥ vipassanāya samannāgataḥ

original: “Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte aha bhante āyasmantam anuruddham etat avoca

original: ‘byākataṁ kho, āvuso anuruddha, āyasmatā revatena …pe…
analyzed: byākatam khalu āvuso anuruddhaḥ āyasmatā revatena pe

original: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso anuruddha, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’ti.
analyzed: katharūpena āvuso anuruddha bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, āyasmā anuruddho maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte bhante āyasmai anuruddhaḥ mam etat avoca

original: ‘idhāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṁ lokānaṁ voloketi.
analyzed: idha āvuso sāriputta bhikkhu dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena sahassam lokānam voloketi

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso sāriputta, cakkhumā puriso …pe…
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso sāriputta cakkhumā puriso pe

original: evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti.
analyzed: evarūpena kho āvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: “Sādhu sādhu, sāriputta, yathā taṁ anuruddhova sammā byākaramāno byākareyya.
analyzed: sādhu sādhu sāriputta yathā tam anuruddhaḥ uva sammā byākaramānaḥ byākareyya

original: Anuruddho hi, sāriputta, dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassaṁ lokānaṁ voloketī”ti.
analyzed: anuruddhaḥ hi sāriputta dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena sahassam lokānam voloketi iti

original: “Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ, bhante, āyasmantaṁ mahākassapaṁ etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte aha bhante āyasmantam mahākassapam etat avoca

original: ‘byākataṁ kho, āvuso kassapa, āyasmatā anuruddhena yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
analyzed: byākatam kho āvuso kassapa āyasmatā anuruddhena yathāsakam paṭibhāna

original: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ mahākassapaṁ pucchāma …pe…
analyzed: tattha dāni mayam āyasmantam mahākassapam pucchāma pe

original: kathaṁrūpena kho, āvuso kassapa, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’ti?
analyzed: katharūpena kho āvuso kassapa bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, āyasmā mahākassapo maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte bhante āyasmā mahākassapaḥ mam etat avoca

original: ‘idhāvuso sāriputta, bhikkhu attanā ca āraññiko hoti āraññikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
analyzed: idha āvuso sāriputta bhikkhu attanā ca āraññikaḥ hoti āraññika ttassa ca vaṇṇa vādī

original: attanā ca piṇḍapātiko hoti …pe… attanā ca paṁsukūliko hoti …pe… attanā ca tecīvariko
analyzed: attanā ca piṇḍapātikaḥ hoti pe attanā ca pasukūlikaḥ hoti pe attanā ca tecīvarikaḥ

original: hoti …pe… attanā ca appiccho hoti …pe… attanā ca santuṭṭho hoti …pe… attanā ca pavivitto
analyzed: hoti pe attanā ca appicchaḥ hoti pe attanā ca santuṭṭhaḥ hoti pe attanā ca pavivitto

original: hoti …pe… attanā ca asaṁsaṭṭho hoti …pe… attanā ca āraddhavīriyo hoti …pe… attanā
analyzed: hoti pe attanā ca a sasaṭṭho hoti pe attanā ca āraddha vīriyaḥ hoti pe attanā

original: ca sīlasampanno hoti …pe… attanā ca samādhisampanno hoti …pe… attanā ca paññāsampanno
analyzed: ca sīla sampannaḥ hoti pe attanā ca samādhi sampannaḥ hoti pe attanā ca paññā sampannaḥ

original: hoti … attanā ca vimuttisampanno hoti … attanā ca vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno hoti
analyzed: hoti attanā ca vimutti sampannaḥ hoti attanā ca vimutti ñāṇa dassana sampannaḥ hoti

original: vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī.
analyzed: vimutti ñāṇa dassana sampadāya ca vaṇṇa vādī

original: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti.
analyzed: evarūpena kho āvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: “Sādhu sādhu, sāriputta.
analyzed: sādhu sādhu sāriputta

original: Yathā taṁ kassapova sammā byākaramāno byākareyya.
analyzed: yathā tam kassapa uva sammā byākaramānaḥ byākareyya

original: Kassapo hi, sāriputta, attanā ca āraññiko āraññikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca
analyzed: kassapaḥ hi sāriputta attanā ca āraññikaḥ āraññika ttassa ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca

original: piṇḍapātiko piṇḍapātikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca paṁsukūliko paṁsukūlikattassa
analyzed: piṇḍapātiko piṇḍapātikattassa ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca pasukūliko pasukūlikattassa

original: ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca tecīvariko tecīvarikattassa ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca appiccho
analyzed: ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca tecīvariko tecīvarikattassa ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca appiccho

original: appicchatāya ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca santuṭṭho santuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca
analyzed: appicchatāya ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca santuṭṭhaḥ santuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca

original: pavivitto pavivekassa ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca asaṁsaṭṭho asaṁsaggassa ca vaṇṇavādī,
analyzed: pavivittaḥ pavivekassa ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca a sasaṭṭhaḥ a sasaggassa ca vaṇṇa vādī

original: attanā ca āraddhavīriyo vīriyārambhassa ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca sīlasampanno sīlasampadāya
analyzed: attanā ca āraddha vīriyaḥ vīriya ārambhassa ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca sīla sampanno sīla sampadāya

original: ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca samādhisampanno samādhisampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca
analyzed: ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca samādhi sampanno samādhi sampadāya ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca

original: paññāsampanno paññāsampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca vimuttisampanno vimuttisampadāya
analyzed: paññā sampannaḥ paññā sampadāya ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca vimutti sampannaḥ vimutti sampadāya

original: ca vaṇṇavādī, attanā ca vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya ca vaṇṇavādī”ti.
analyzed: ca vaṇṇa vādī attanā ca vimutti ñāṇa dassana sampannaḥ vimutti ñāṇa dassana sampadāya ca vaṇṇa vādī iti

original: “Evaṁ vutte, ahaṁ bhante āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: evam vutte aham bhante āyasmantam mahāmoggallānam etat avoca

original: ‘byākataṁ kho, āvuso moggallāna, āyasmatā mahākassapena yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.

analyzed: tattha dāni mayam āyasmantam mahāmoggallānam pucchāma pe

original: kathaṁrūpena, āvuso moggallāna, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’ti?
analyzed: katharūpena āvuso moggallāna bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

analyzed: evam vutte bhante āyasmā mahāmoggallānaḥ mam etat avoca

original: ‘idhāvuso sāriputta, dve bhikkhū abhidhammakathaṁ kathenti. Te aññamaññaṁ pañhaṁ
analyzed: idha āvuso sāriputta dve bhikkhū abhidhamma katham kathenti te aññamaññam pañha

original: pucchanti, aññamaññassa pañhaṁ puṭṭhā vissajjenti, no ca saṁsādenti, dhammī ca nesaṁ
analyzed: pucchanti aññamaññassa pañham puṭṭhāḥ vissajjenti no ca sasādenti dhammī ca na isa

original: kathā pavattinī hoti.
analyzed: kathā pavattinī hoti

original: Evarūpena kho, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti.
analyzed: evarūpena kho āvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

analyzed: sādhu sādhu sāriputta yathā tam moggallānaḥ uva sammā byākaramānaḥ byākareyya

original: Moggallāno hi, sāriputta, dhammakathiko”ti.
analyzed: moggallānaḥ hi sāriputta dhamma kathiko ti

original: “atha khvāhaṁ, bhante, āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ etadavocaṁ:
analyzed: atha khvā āha bhante āyasmantam sāriputtam etat avoca

original: ‘byākataṁ kho, āvuso sāriputta, amhehi sabbeheva yathāsakaṁ paṭibhānaṁ.
analyzed: byākatam kho āvuso sāriputta amhehi sabbehi iva yathāsakam paṭibhāna

original: Tattha dāni mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ pucchāma—
analyzed: tattha dāni mayam āyasmantam sāriputtam pucchāma

original: ramaṇīyaṁ, āvuso sāriputta, gosiṅgasālavanaṁ, dosinā ratti, sabbaphāliphullā sālā, dibbā, maññe, gandhā sampavanti.
analyzed: ramaṇīye āvuso sāriputta gosiṅga sāla vana dosinā ratti sabba phāli phullā sālā dibbāḥ maññe gandhāḥ sampavanti

original: Kathaṁrūpena, āvuso sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’ti?
analyzed: katharūpena āvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā gosiṅga sāla vanam sobheyya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhante, āyasmā sāriputto maṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte bhante āyasmā sāriputtaḥ mam etat avoca

original: ‘idhāvuso moggallāna, bhikkhu cittaṁ vasaṁ vatteti no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati.
analyzed: idha āvuso moggallāna bhikkhu cittam vasam vatteti no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati

original: So yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tāya vihārasamāpattiyā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharati;
analyzed: saḥ yāya vihāra samāpattiyā ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayam viharitu tāya vihāra samāpattiyā pubbaṇhasamayam viharati

original: yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati majjhanhikasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tāya vihārasamāpattiyā majjhanhikasamayaṁ viharati;
analyzed: yāya vihāra samāpattiyā ākaṅkhati majjhanhika samayam viharitu tāya vihāra samāpattiyā majjhanhika samayam viharati

original: yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati sāyanhasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tāya vihārasamāpattiyā sāyanhasamayaṁ viharati.
analyzed: yāya vihāra samāpattiyai ākaṅkhati sāyanhasamayam viharitu tāya vihāra samāpattiyā sāyanhasamayam viharati

original: Seyyathāpi, āvuso moggallāna, rañño vā rājamahāmattassa vā nānārattānaṁ dussānaṁ dussakaraṇḍako pūro assa.
analyzed: seyyathā api āvuso moggallāna raññaḥ vā rāja mahāmattassa vā nānā rattānam dussānam dussa karaṇḍakaḥ pūraḥ assa

original: So yaññadeva dussayugaṁ ākaṅkheyya pubbaṇhasamayaṁ pārupituṁ, taṁ tadeva dussayugaṁ pubbaṇhasamayaṁ pārupeyya;
analyzed: saḥ yaññat eva dussa yugam ākaṅkheyya pubbaṇhasamayam pārupitu tam tat eva dussa yugam pubbaṇhasamayam pārupeyya

original: yaññadeva dussayugaṁ ākaṅkheyya majjhanhikasamayaṁ pārupituṁ, taṁ tadeva dussayugaṁ majjhanhikasamayaṁ pārupeyya;
analyzed: yaññat eva dussa yugam ākaṅkheyya majjhanhika samayam pārupitu tam tat eva dussa yugam majjhanhika samayam pārupeyya

original: yaññadeva dussayugaṁ ākaṅkheyya sāyanhasamayaṁ pārupituṁ, taṁ tadeva dussayugaṁ sāyanhasamayaṁ pārupeyya.
analyzed: yaññat eva dussayugam ākaṅkheyya sāyanhasamayam tam tat eva dussayugam sāyanhasamayam pārupeyya

original: Evameva kho, āvuso moggallāna, bhikkhu cittaṁ vasaṁ vatteti, no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati.
analyzed: evam eva kho āvuso moggallāna bhikkhu cittam vasam vatteti no ca bhikkhu cittassa vasena vattati

original: So yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tāya vihārasamāpattiyā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharati;
analyzed: saḥ yāya vihāra samāpattiyā ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayam viharitu tāya vihāra samāpattiyā pubbaṇhasamayam viharati

original: yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati majjhanhikasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tāya vihārasamāpattiyā majjhanhikasamayaṁ viharati;
analyzed: yāya vihāra samāpattiyā ākaṅkhati majjhanhika samayam viharitu tāya vihāra samāpattiyā majjhanhika samayam viharati

original: yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati sāyanhasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tāya vihārasamāpattiyā sāyanhasamayaṁ viharati.
analyzed: yāya vihāra samāpattiyai ākaṅkhati sāyanhasamayam viharitu tāya vihāra samāpattiyā sāyanhasamayam viharati

original: Evarūpena kho, āvuso moggallāna, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā’”ti.
analyzed: evarūpena kho āvuso moggallāna bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: “Sādhu sādhu, moggallāna.
analyzed: sādhu sādhu moggallāna

original: Yathā taṁ sāriputtova sammā byākaramāno byākareyya.
analyzed: yathā tam sāriputtaḥ uva sammā byākaramānaḥ byākareyya

original: Sāriputto hi, moggallāna, cittaṁ vasaṁ vatteti no ca sāriputto cittassa vasena vattati.
analyzed: sāriputtaḥ hi moggallāna cittam vasam vatteti no ca sāriputto cittassa vasena vattati

original: So yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tāya vihārasamāpattiyā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ viharati;
analyzed: saḥ yāya vihāra samāpattiyā ākaṅkhati pubbaṇhasamayam viharitu tāya vihāra samāpattiyā pubbaṇhasamayam viharati

original: yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati majjhanhikasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tāya vihārasamāpattiyā majjhanhikasamayaṁ viharati;
analyzed: yāya vihāra samāpattiyā ākaṅkhati majjhanhika samayam viharitu tāya vihāra samāpattiyā majjhanhika samayam viharati

original: yāya vihārasamāpattiyā ākaṅkhati sāyanhasamayaṁ viharituṁ, tāya vihārasamāpattiyā sāyanhasamayaṁ viharatī”ti.
analyzed: yāya vihāra samāpattiyai ākaṅkhati sāyanhasamayam viharitu tāya vihāra samāpattiyā sāyanhasamayam viharati iti

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā sāriputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmā sāriputtaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “kassa nu kho, bhante, subhāsitan”ti?
analyzed: kassa nu kho bhante su bhāsitanti

original: “Sabbesaṁ vo, sāriputta, subhāsitaṁ pariyāyena.
analyzed: sabbesam vaḥ sāriputta su bhāsitam pariyāyena

original: Api ca mamapi suṇātha yathārūpena bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyya.
analyzed: api ca mam api suṇātha yathārūpena bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya

original: Idha, sāriputta, bhikkhu pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā:
analyzed: idha sāriputta bhikkhu pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ nisīdati pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya parimukham satim upaṭṭhapetvā

original: ‘na tāvāhaṁ imaṁ pallaṅkaṁ bhindissāmi yāva me nānupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuccissatī’ti.
analyzed: na tāva aham imam pallaṅkam bhindissāmi yāva me na an upādāya āsavehi cittam vimuccissati iti

original: Evarūpena kho, sāriputta, bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanaṁ sobheyyā”ti.
analyzed: evarūpena kho sāriputta bhikkhunā gosiṅgasālavanam sobheyya ati

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te āyasmanto bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: atta manāḥ te āyasmantaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Mahāgosiṅgasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ dutiyaṁ.
analyzed: mahāgosiṅga suttam niṭṭhitam dutiya
